__e: I've never done anything foolish in my life and it's high time I did.
There isn't a person in this room who hasn't made a big mistake and doesn't have to live live with it.
If someone's making a mistake and it's not your place to interfere, say:
What I didn't realize was that I was making the biggest mistake... of all.
Am I making the biggest mistake of my life?
Oh well we finally got some time alone, we talked, I told her it would be a mistake if we stayed together.
